job.title: Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr
job.description:
Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer Sr

Duration: 8 months

Plano, TX (Remote till labor day)

Potential Contract to Hire eligible candidates

About The Department And Team

Data Governance and risk management. From the organizational point of view, we get high-quality trusted data. The vision is to make sure that the data used within data finance should meet the quality standards, we work with different accountable professionals to make sure that we deliver the data as per the pre-defined standards. In case the data is not up to the mark we do root cause analysis and provide those risk analyses to the team.

The volume of the work is huge

Not taking the manual approach

The primary role is not to shift these data from one place to another; it would be nice to have

Technology Required (Must Have)

Targeting for 3-5 years of experienced candidates

(Not completely a data engineer)

Python: Proficient (Programming and scripting so that they know what to do in case there is any loophole or correction is needed)

SQL: Must have very strong

BI: Grafana or Tableau

Nice to have: AWS (for them to get converted to full time)

Data governance and Data management knowledge

Soft Skills

Interact with senior folks; directors and audience

Good Presenting skills to explain the data (Very Important)

Someone comfortable to deal with the high Volume work (Very Important)

Perform root cause analysis and risk report for COAF datasets

Python, SQL, Tableau
